revised_title: A Description of a Seismic Event Felt Universally in London and Westminster
tldr: The author, Henry Baker, describes a sudden and violent shaking event experienced universally throughout London and Westminster. The event was more violent and longer in duration than a previous earthquake that occurred on February 8th. People from various parts of the city and its surroundings reported feeling the shaking, with some even feeling it in their beds or boats on the river.
